Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

How do you like the Battletech 
(mechwarrior) posts I made? 

  o They're okay 
  o I don't like them much 
  o I didn't get shit of what you were talking about 
  o That rocks! 
  o OOH!!! Battlemechs! Nice!!!! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=942035  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
